Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you back and reminds me of your grandma and grandpa watching this classic together. It’s just wrong to hate films like those!
